content.body: Rob Palmer: Hi! A colleague from a different team at Mozilla just asked me about attending the upcoming plenary as an observer. Is there any process that needs to be followed for that, or can they just show up?
content.formatted_body: Rob Palmer: Hi! A colleague from a different team at Mozilla just asked me about attending the upcoming plenary as an observer. Is there any process that needs to be followed for that, or can they just show up?

content.body: I think just notifying on the reflector thread should suffice
